body_html: CUDA 9.1 will require driver 387+. This means enterprises have to upgrade their fleets. I have not looked at a timeline for 9.1. It should work in source (someone internally was using it the other day but I did not ask how or even with TensorFlow directly) now but maybe not using all the latest optimized features that were added. We will likely not look to closely until Jan. Once I get things together I will try to publish a very unofficial timeline. If anyone has verified it works (even just with CUDA 9 level perf) at head let me know. I am too busy to try right now.
